text: Nabii Mucammadow too Nabii Nuuc kee kay marak kol maaqné xaagi usuk qellitte xaagittey wacyih kol oobisna kinni, atu ama xaagu aaxaguk masuginnitooy ku mari aaxaguk masuginna tama Qhuraan kol oobisnak duma, toysa ku mari kot abah yan adáa kee dirabboysiyyal isbir, diggah meqe ellecabo addunyaa kee akeeral Yallak meesite marihim kinnik
